name: Solitaire - Patience Pro
description:
Welcome to one of the most famous and captivating card games. The Classic solitaire, also known as Klondike, is a one-player card game.

Features:
-Personalize: Replace the background of the game with your own images.

-One Click Move: Easily move cards with one click. You can also manually move the cards.

-No stress: No stopwatch, just relax and enjoy the game.

-Automation: Complete the game automatically with the included Autocomplete feature.

-Gamecenter: see how you score against other players

To play it is necessary to move the cards on the four stacks in the top right. The cards are sorted by colors and suites in ascending order from Ace to King. The challenge is to successfully discover and move the cards from the columns to the stacks. Solitaire is a great way to sharpen your mind while having fun!
